_meta.note: Defines the 15 core customer record fields for the IonWave CRM/CDP. Privacy levels and data sources specified for compliance.

data.model_description: Core customer record schema for IonWave. Every customer interaction should enrich this record. Privacy-first design with encrypted PII fields.

fields.notes: Primary identifier. Must be collected with explicit opt-in consent.

fields.updated_when: Once (at first capture), customer can update
fields.notes: First and last name. Used for personalization in emails and support.

fields.source: Computed from purchase history and engagement
fields.notes: Maps to Customer Segmentation model: Prospect, One-Timer, Repeat, Subscriber, VIP, At-Risk, Lapsed, Churned.

fields.source: UTM parameters, Meta pixel, referral tracking
fields.notes: Critical for CAC calculation by channel. Never overwrite - first touch only.
Cumulative order count. Drives Frequency score in RFM model.
Gross revenue from customer. Does not include refunds/chargebacks. Drives Monetary score in RFM.

fields.source: Computed from Shopify last order date
fields.notes: Drives Recency score in RFM. Used to trigger win-back and churn intervention flows.

fields.updated_when: Every subscription event (create, pause, cancel, resume)
fields.notes: Values: None, Active, Paused, Cancelled. Subscription customers have 3-5x higher LTV.
Net Promoter Score. 9-10 = Promoter, 7-8 = Passive, 0-6 = Detractor. Detractors trigger immediate outreach.
High ticket count without resolution is a strong churn signal. Track resolution rate alongside count.

fields.source: Survey responses, product reviews, support conversations
fields.notes: Qualitative feedback. Should be tagged by category: Taste, Effectiveness, Packaging, Price, Other.
Number of successful referrals (referred customer completed purchase). High referrers are ambassador candidates.
Tracks open rate, click rate, last engaged date. Disengaged contacts (90+ days no open) should enter sunset flow.
Tracks ad impressions, clicks, and conversions. Used to build lookalike audiences from best customers.

fields.source: Computed from multiple signals (engagement, purchase recency, NPS, support tickets)
fields.notes: Composite score. Inputs: Days since last purchase, email engagement trend, NPS trajectory, support ticket frequency. Score >70 triggers churn intervention flow.
